(please let me use this, it's important to my characters...)

Plintissa/Sin=
esis:

Plintissa walked along until she bumped into Sinesis..she pulled out=
 her blaster.....Sinesis showed his hands... "peace!...i need a partner and=
 your perfect!....you were originally a Predacon!..." he said, for he had s=
een what had happened earlier.....they told each other about themselves and=
 teamed up, forming the new team of the Hunter's Pride!........they walked =
off together, coming to the Maximal base, and using a new device stolen fro=
m somewhere to dig under and into the Ark.......they destroyed all of the a=
utoguns, becoming decently damaged in the process...they smiled at each oth=
er and searched until they found the secret location of the Autobots...they=
 got ready to blast the Autobots!..... meanwhile, nearby....one bot knew of=
 this....because he heard someone crying out for help....at least in his ow=
n mind....The Artist Formerly Known As Suukie ran as fast as he could....he=
 ran up and baseball slid, knocking them both down!..... "i shall not let y=
ou destroy the Maximals, or Autobots!...there won't be enough left of you t=
o fill 2 pots!...." Suukie said....Hunter's Pride had a simple answer....be=
at up Suukie....they beat him up and continued their plan....Suukie stopped=
 them again, punching them both down...........PLINTISSA FELT REALLY BAD OF=
 HERSELF, BUT IF THIS MEANT DESTROYING LIONO PRIME, THEN SO BE IT..... (soo=
ry, that last sentence was in capitals..my mistake...) but, then, she reali=
zed that if she destroyed these, then what of Iron raptor? she was a Maxima=
l to begin with!....she spun around and sliced her star through Sinesis....=
he looked at her with angry eyes.....he grabbed her and pummeled her, not b=
eing affected by her shots, because she was the weaker bewteen them because=
 she recieved the most damage.....he carried her over...IMPALE! right on a =
broken autogun! she was impaled again!.....Sinesi aimed at the Autobots, bu=
t Suukie tripped him up again....Suukie was thrown backwards and onto anoth=
er broken off autogun...he pulled himself off and wrestled with Sinesis....=
...Sinesis tried his best to destroy, and Suukie tried to protect......Sine=
sis finally forced Suukie down...he aimed his gun at the Autobots.....Suuki=
e tackles again... "give it up!..." Sinesis yells while puching back......
